EmailTemplate.description: This is to send the document to the customer to sign
EmailTemplate.name: Amendment of your DuPont™ Nomex® Trademark License Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: Amendment of your DuPont™ Nomex® Trademark License Agreement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr. / Mrs. {!Qualification__c.Related_Contact__c}
We would like to kindly inform you that DuPont™ Nomex® Trademark License Agreement you have signed on June 15th, 2012 expired and in this respect, we have prepared an amendment.
If you agree with the attached amendment of the Trademark Licensing Agreement, please print out 2 copies and sign them. The original contracts should then be sent by post to our Geneva office, at the below address: DuPont International Operations Sàrl Mrs. Christel Pavlousek Chemin du Pavillon 2 1218 Le Grand-Saconnex SWITZERLAND
We are looking forward to hearing from you and should you have any question, please feel free to contact us.
Wishing you a nice day ahead. With best regards,
Christel Pavlousek Nomex® Labeling Program Coordinator Tel: +41 22 717 5025 Fax: +41 22 580 2445
